featured.text: In Belize, where howler monkeys were newly reintroduced into a wildlife sanctuary, the howler monkeys were heard only a few times a week rather than every day.
At the sanctuary, keepers now use recorded howler sounds from a distance so that the monkeys feel the need to make the territorial calls as they would do in the wild.
Why do the keepers at the sanctuary use recorded howls? (A) To prevent the howler monkeys from getting homesick.

definition.en_def: A place of refuge or safety.
definition.example: The old church served as a sanctuary for those seeking shelter from the storm.
